name: The Grand Peratrur Nation
description:
A real-time tactics game centered around a former great nation. The Grand Peratrur Nation explores history and who determines how it is interpreted for future generations.

You'll explore how history plays out from the perspective of three different people, all with different goals, ideals, and stories. When conflict arises you will handle it either with a sword and shield or your wits and verbiage.

Controls:

Arrow Buttons - Move

Space - Attack/Persuade

D - Defend/Rebuff

Enter - Select Option

ESC - Pause

F- Fullscreen (toggle)
